title: tab + alt minimizes my game window
body:
This is different from alt + tab.  I have actually disabled alt + tab using AutoHotKey scripts

To recreate, hold tab, hold alt, then release tab.   The game minimizes.

I have bound my tab to attack move.  My self casts are alt + spell.  Sometimes when I press them too fast, my game minimizes.

Is this tab + alt behavior intentional? and if so is there a way I can override it.

Thanks!
